Posts.Content: Hello Karen, Thank you so very much for your post. I also started to panic and thought I'd be regretting all of the times I said: "chemo has been so easy!" I am on EC and doing really well on it and hoping that I will also be able to go through my 4 T sessions without too many problems. Thank you, you gave me some much needed hope and perspective. Sabrina
Posts.Title: Taxotere.........please stop panicking!
